abstract: Coming together--Happy families--Living dangerously--Sex, lies and muesli yoghurt
description: Episode number 1 of Series "This life". 'Coming together' (dir. Sam Miller): Interview day at chambers. Milly and Egg are contemplating the protocol of working at the same firm and concealing their relationship. Anna questions her chances for employment when past lover Miles is on the interview panel. Milly's first case is defending someone accused of stealing a shopping trolley. 'Happy families' (dir. Sam Miller): Warren is hiding his homosexuality from his cousin Kira, Egg is doubting his career, and Miles begins a relationship with ditzy model, Delilah, which causes problems with Anna who is now sharing the house. 'Living dangerously': (dir. Sam Miller) Delilah's drug infested past comes back to haunt her but Miles is oblivious to what Anna can see is going on. Egg becomes involved in a case defending a young cancer patient. 'Sex, lies and muesli yoghurt' (dir. Audrey Cooke): Warren's yoghurt keeps going missing and the house is broken into at the same time Milly loses her keys. Anna suspects Delilah is behind the theft and is leading the move to have her thrown out; convincing Miles is proving to be difficult. Cast includes Jack Davenport, Daniella Nardini, Amita Dhiri, Jason Hughes and Andrew Lincoln.
